points.title: You maintain ownership of your data

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.localized_title: Vous restez propriétaire de vos données
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

case.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
case.localized_title: Il est conseillé aux utilisateurs de consulter régulièrement les conditions d'utilisation, bien qu'en cas de changements importants, le service en informera les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

case.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
case.localized_title: Le service peut suspendre votre compte pour plusieurs raisons

points.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.localized_title: Ce service oblige les utilisateurs à recourir à l'arbitrage obligatoire en cas de litige
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des conditions.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles peuvent être vendues ou transférées dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Votre adresse IP est collectée, ce qui peut être utilisé pour connaître votre position approximative.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Les informations vous concernant sont recueillies par des tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées pour faire de la publicité ciblée par des tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.localized_title: Votre profil est combiné à différents produits
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Des détails sont fournis sur le type d'informations collectées.
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: Private messages can be read

case.title: Private messages can be read
case.localized_title: Les messages privés peuvent être lus
case.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour la publicité
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont vos données personnelles sont utilisées
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service partage vos données personnelles avec des tiers qui ne sont pas impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: Your personal data is not sold

case.title: Your personal data is not sold
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles ne sont pas vendues
case.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels and device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi et des empreintes digitales d'appareils.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Ce service ignore l'en-tête Do Not Track (DNT) et suit les utilisateurs même s'ils ont activé cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Votre adresse IP est collectée, ce qui peut être utilisé pour connaître votre position approximative.

points.title: Your biometric data is collected

case.title: Your biometric data is collected
case.localized_title: Vos données biométriques sont collectées
case.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.localized_title: Ce service reçoit votre position précise grâce aux coordonnées GPS
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par les cookies/pixels des médias sociaux.
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: Many different types of personal data are collected

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.localized_title: De nombreux types de données personnelles sont collectés
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à votre droit à une action collective.
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

case.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
case.localized_title: Vos informations personnelles sont utilisées à de nombreuses fins
case.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent aux attentes ou aux exigences des utilisateurs
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

case.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de défendre, d'indemniser et de dégager le service de toute responsabilité en cas de réclamation liée à votre utilisation du service.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à votre droit à une action collective.
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

case.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
case.localized_title: Le service peut modifier ses conditions à tout moment, mais l'utilisateur recevra une notification des modifications.
case.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.

points.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

case.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
case.localized_title: Si vous proposez des suggestions au service, celui-ci peut les utiliser sans votre accord ni compensation, mais il n'en devient pas propriétaire.
case.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

case.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
case.localized_title: Si vous faites l'objet d'une revendication de droits d'auteur, votre contenu peut être supprimé
case.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.

points.title: You waive your moral rights

case.title: You waive your moral rights
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à vos droits moraux
case.description:
Moral rights are rights to creators of literary, dramatic, musical and artistic works, as well as directors of films.

"The moral rights include the right of attribution, the right to have a work published anonymously or pseudonymously, and the right to the integrity of the work. The preserving of the integrity of the work allows the author to object to alteration, distortion, or mutilation of the work that is "prejudicial to the author's honor or reputation". Anything else that may detract from the artist's relationship with the work even after it leaves the artist's possession or ownership may bring these moral rights into play. Moral rights are distinct from any economic rights tied to copyrights. Even if an artist has assigned his or her copyright rights to a work to a third party, he or she still maintains the moral rights to the work." -Wikipedia

In general, any terms that use the exact words "moral rights" as rights that are waived will fall under this Case.

points.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.localized_title: Certains contenus peuvent être supprimés sans raison et sans préavis.
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Votre compte peut être supprimé sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas l'exactitude ou la fiabilité des informations fournies
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

case.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
case.localized_title: Votre compte peut être suspendu pour plusieurs raisons

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason

case.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason
case.localized_title: Le contenu que vous publiez peut être modifié par le service pour quelque raison que ce soit
case.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.
